text: Place the pistachio nuts into a blender. Blend, remove and put aside. Add the apricots, crystallised ginger, rum or juice, and ground almonds into the blender. Pulse until the resulting mixture is sticky. Tip the apricot blend into a bowl. Add the chopped dried cranberries and mix together. Prepare the ball shapes. Take about a teaspoon of mixture and roll into a ball shape on a clean surface. Once formed, roll in the ground pistachios. Arrange on a tray lined with baking paper or wax paper. Place in the refrigerator to chill for an hour. Serve. These also make excellent gifts.
